author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-2119.  Optimize scheduling of jobs with large numbers of
tasks by replacing static arrays with lists of runnable tasks.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-899] fix Result Spec compile so that it merges created subtypes for particular languages and "allFeatures" settings with pre-existing ones.  The merge "or"s the languages together, and makes "allFeatures" predominate over not all features.
